messages.zh: 第六关（后）
messages.en: level 6(post)

messages.zh: 侦查完毕，确认敌追击部队已被我方全歼。
messages.en: Investigation complete, enemy’s pursuing forces are completely eliminated.

messages.zh: 我们成功突围了。
messages.en: We’ve broken through.

messages.zh: 虽然消灭的只是包围阵势中一小部分的兵力......
messages.en: Although we only eliminated a small part of the encirclement……

messages.zh: 至少，我们暂时安全了。
messages.en: At least, we’re safe for now.

messages.zh: 谢谢你刚才的援助，临光不会忘记这份恩情。
messages.en: Thank you for your support before, Nearl will not forget this debt.

messages.zh: 请别这么说。我可没资格让耀骑士还我人情。
messages.en: Please don’t say that. I don’t deserve an Illumiknight’s repayment.

messages.zh: 刚才那个，是狙击手吧。
messages.en: That was a sniper before, right.

messages.zh: 是，但那不是普通的弓弩。
messages.en: Yes, but that was no ordinary crossbow.

messages.zh: 如果第二发射击再次直接命中盾牌，这只手可能就完了。
messages.en: If the second shot hit my shield directly again, this hand is probably done for.

messages.zh: 是那个凶狠的孩子下令射击的？我完全没能发现狙击手的踪迹。
messages.en: Did that malicious kid order it? I didn’t find any trace of the sniper.

messages.zh: 可怕的敌人。
messages.en: A dangerous enemy.

messages.zh: 但他们——为什么没有继续追击？
messages.en: But——why didn’t they keep chasing?

messages.zh: 对不起......我失手了。
messages.en: Sorry……I messed up.

messages.zh: 你别道歉啊，是我的错。我太冲动了。
messages.en: Don’t apologize, it was my fault. I was too rashed.

messages.zh: 能帮我追踪他们吗？我去把情况通报给塔露拉姐姐。
messages.en: Can you track them for me? I’ll go inform the situation to Talulah.

messages.zh: 她那里应该也完成了对切城指挥部和防卫军驻地的压制——
messages.en: She should have finished suppressing Chernobog’s headquarters and the National Guard encampments——

messages.zh: 就让她来决定这些虫子的生死吧。
messages.en: Let her decide those bugs’ lives.
……Understood.

messages.zh: 小心点，优先保护好自己，好吗？
messages.en: Be careful, keep yourself protected first, okay?
……Yes.

messages.zh: 同胞们，该走了。
messages.en: Brothers and sisters, it’s time to go.

messages.zh: 去迎接属于我们的时代吧！！
messages.en: Let’s go embrace our time!!

messages.zh: 噢噢噢噢！！！解放所有人！！！
messages.en: Owhhhh!!! To liberate everyone!!!

messages.zh: （真正的恐怖要追上你们了，罗德岛的虫子——）
messages.en: (Real terror is about to catch up to you, Rhodes Island bugs——)
